experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.description:
I successfully contributed to the development of a professional mentoring platform. I actively participated in various phases of the project, including market research, platform design, user flow realization, and UX/UI design using Figma. Additionally, I played a significant role in creating the conceptual model (UML/Merise), designing and implementing the database using PostgreSQL, building the back-end with Express.js, and developing the front-end with React.js.

Skills utilized during this internship:
 • Trello for project management
 • Agile methodologies for efficient workflow
 • Slack for effective communication
 • API Postman for testing and integration
 • Express.js for back-end development
 • PostgreSQL for database architecture and design
 • Node.js for server-side
 • React.js for front-end development
 • User Experience (UX) principles for enhancing platform usability
 • Figma for UI/UX design
 • Unified Modeling Language (UML) for creating the conceptual model
 • Web development techniques
 • Merise for database modeling

I am proud to have been part of this internship and to have gained valuable experience in these areas.

experiences.title: DevOps Engineer
experiences.description:
I'm excited to share that I've embarked on a DevOps internship at Mossahamati. In this role, I am honing my skills with Docker, Selenium for testing, and Jenkins for continuous integration.

This opportunity allows me to dive deep into containerization, ensure robust and automated testing, and streamline our integration processes. I'm looking forward to applying these skills in real-world scenarios and contributing to our projects at Mossahamati.

Stay tuned for updates on this exciting journey!
I'm excited to share that I've embarked on a DevOps internship at Mossahamati. In this role, I am honing my skills with Docker, Selenium for testing, and Jenkins for continuous integration. This opportunity allows me to dive deep into containerization, ensure robust and automated testing, and streamline our integration processes. I'm looking forward to applying these skills in real-world scenarios and contributing to our projects at Mossahamati. Stay tuned for updates on this exciting journey!
Skills: docker · Selenium · Python (Programming Language) · Docker Swarm · Jenkins

experiences.title: Graduation Internship
experiences.description:
Graduation Senior Project in MDC Ingénierie « New Jorf Lasfar Harbour »:

+) Developing BRAAN 7: Harbour Resonance Simulator for coastal modeling applications.
+) New Jorf Lasfar harbour resonance study using MIKE 21 and BRAAN 7: Harbour Resonance Simulator.
+) Design of rubble mound breakwater and stability geotechnical study.
Graduation Senior Project in MDC Ingénierie « New Jorf Lasfar Harbour »: +) Developing BRAAN 7: Harbour Resonance Simulator for coastal modeling applications. +) New Jorf Lasfar harbour resonance study using MIKE 21 and BRAAN 7: Harbour Resonance Simulator. +) Design of rubble mound breakwater and stability geotechnical study.

educations.description:
The ALX Software Engineering Program, in partnership with Holberton School and funded by Mastercard Foundation, is an intense 12-month program provided me with essential skills and knowledge for the tech industry through hands-on learning and real-world applications.

In this program, I learned about Programming, Algorithms and Data Structures, Web Development, DovOps and System Engineering .

The program's hands-on, project-based approach emphasized my problem-solving and critical thinking.
The ALX Software Engineering Program, in partnership with Holberton School and funded by Mastercard Foundation, is an intense 12-month program provided me with essential skills and knowledge for the tech industry through hands-on learning and real-world applications. In this program, I learned about Programming, Algorithms and Data Structures, Web Development, DovOps and System Engineering . The program's hands-on, project-based approach emphasized my problem-solving and critical thinking.
Skills: Web Development · DevOps · JavaScript · Python · Git · Bash · Algorithms · Data Structures · Linux · Problem Solving · Critical Thinking · Flask · C (Programming Language) · jQuery · SQL · HTML CSS
